Simple Boxes

Simple visual content container.

Dark box.
Light box.
Lighter box.
Default, unstyled box. 
<div class="box box-dark">
  Dark box.
</div>

<div class="box box-light">
  Light box.
</div>

<div class="box box-lighter">
  Lighter box.
</div>

<div class="box">
  Default, unstyled box.
</div>

Modifiers

Simple visual modifiers that can be applied to most other boxes. Boxes have a white background by default that can set to transparent using .box-trans.

Thick border.
More vertical padding.
No padding.
Shadow.
Teal background.
Tan background. 
<div class="box box-dark box-thick">
  Thick border.
</div>

<div class="box box-light box-md">
  More vertical padding.
</div>

<div class="box box-light box-sheer">
  No padding.
</div>

<div class="box box-lighter box-shadow">
  Shadow.
</div>

<div class="box box-light box-md box-teal">
  Teal background.
</div>

<div class="box box-lighter box-md box-tan">
  Tan background.
</div>

Full-Width Boxes

Full boxes lack side borders or radii. They can act like default boxes at certain breakpoints by also including the box-default-xs, box-default-sm, box-default-md or box-default-lg classes.

This box will always be "full-width."
This box is full-width at small sizes, but becomes "normal" at a certain breakpoint. 
<div class="box-full box-light">
  This box will always be "full-width."
</div>

<div class="box-full box-light box-default-sm">
  This box is full-width at small sizes, but becomes "normal" at a certain breakpoint.
</div>

Fleurons

Fleurons can be added to other box styles. They can be positioned using .top, .right, .bottom and .left.

This box includes three different fleurons in three places.

Every psychic reader at Psychic Source uses a variety of gifts and tools to give you the most insightful, revealing, and helpful reading possible. Many of our gifted psychic readers were born with their psychic gifts, discovering that they possessed these special abilities at an early age. Often the psychic gifts run in the family and are passed down from generation to generation.

<div class="box box-md box-light">
  <span class="fleuron-star-wide top" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  <span class="fleuron-star bottom left" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  <span class="fleuron-star-alt bottom right" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  <p>This box includes three different fleurons in three places.</p>
  <p>Every psychic reader at Psychic Source uses a variety of gifts and tools to give you the most insightful, revealing, and helpful reading possible. Many of our gifted psychic readers were born with their psychic gifts, discovering that they possessed these special abilities at an early age. Often the psychic gifts run in the family and are passed down from generation to generation.</p>
</div>

Stylized Boxes

These boxes incorporate more complex and distinct styles, often with a specific use-case in mind.

This box has a leafy flourish at the top-right corner.

Every psychic reader at Psychic Source uses a variety of gifts and tools to give you the most insightful, revealing, and helpful reading possible. Many of our gifted psychic readers were born with their psychic gifts, discovering that they possessed these special abilities at an early age. Often the psychic gifts run in the family and are passed down from generation to generation.

This box has scroll flourishes on the top and bottom.

Every psychic reader at Psychic Source uses a variety of gifts and tools to give you the most insightful, revealing, and helpful reading possible. Many of our gifted psychic readers were born with their psychic gifts, discovering that they possessed these special abilities at an early age. Often the psychic gifts run in the family and are passed down from generation to generation.

<div class="box box-leaf-tr">
  <p>This box has a leafy flourish at the top-right corner.</p>
  <p>Every psychic reader at Psychic Source uses a variety of gifts and tools to give you the most insightful, revealing, and helpful reading possible. Many of our gifted psychic readers were born with their psychic gifts, discovering that they possessed these special abilities at an early age. Often the psychic gifts run in the family and are passed down from generation to generation.</p>
</div>

<div class="box box-scroll">
  <p>This box has scroll flourishes on the top and bottom.</p>

Often the psychic gifts run in the family and are passed down from generation to generation.</p>
</div>
